categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Fingers" was the nick-name attributed to a female Zabrak animal herder. She specialized in training Borgle bats for arena pit-fighting competition. She hunted the dangerous creatures in their native jungle environment on the Naboo moon of Rori. On one occasion, a Borgle bat bit off two of the fingers on her right hand, earning the Zabrak the uncomplimentary nickname, Fingers.
